attributes.action: Make teaching of mental health mandatory in the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
•Put forward that schools need to teach mental health as it’s own whole subject. 

•Make young people aware in school that there are always people they can talk to ( and making sure there is actually councillors in place to listen) 

•Make it mandatory for teachers to learn about key mental health issues & how to deal with them. (Anxiety & depression)
attributes.background: Ensure that mental health is taken more seriously as a subject in schools. It’s touched on (briefly) in PSE (for some schools) but it needs to be taught in detail - with the importance of asking for help when you feel low highlighted!
